content.question: Which of the following expressions would evaluate to the impulse exerted on the block by the rope during the time interval <math alttext="0 less than t, less than t sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mn>0</mn> <mo><</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo><</mo> <msub> <mi>t</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="uppercase A times the integral from 0 to t sub 1, of, e raised to the negative k t power, d t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>A</mi><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></msubsup><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="m uppercase A times the integral from 0 to t sub 1, of e raised to the negative k t power, d " overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></msubsup><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="uppercase A times the derivative with respect to t of, open bracket, e raised to the negative k t power, close bracket, evaluated at t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>A</mi><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="m times uppercase A times the derivative with respect to t of, open bracket, e raised to the negative k t power, close bracket, evaluated at t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m uppercase A times the integral from 0 to t sub 1, of e raised to the negative k t power, d " overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mi>A</mi><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></msubsup><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
